src:
Stock With Momentum: Censof Holdings
05 Nov 2019, 02:13 by Asia Analytica
Censof Holdings Bhd (+ve)TRADING of shares in Censof Holdings Bhd (fundamental: 0.55/3, valuation: 0.9/3) triggered our momentum algorithm yesterday for the first time this year. The stock closed one sen or 7.69% higher at 14 sen, with 4.66 million shares done, compared with its 200-day average volume of 333,712 shares.
The company provides financial management and asset management solutions, as well as e-payment gateway services. On Oct 2, it bagged a RM34.77 million contract from the Inland Revenue Board of Malaysia (IRB) to install licence renewal, software support and maintenance services for data warehouse systems.
Censof said its wholly-owned subsidiary Century Software (Malaysia) Sdn Bhd accepted a letter of award from the IRB on Oct 1 for the project. The contract’s tenure is from Jan 1, 2020 to Dec 31, 2022.

This article first appeared in The Edge Financial Daily, on November 5, 2019.

Via The Edge Financial Daily
